Ah, there was a commit that grouped these fields together under a `Miner` config (https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/19480).

You can fix it by moving the miner fields in the config a bit:

```
[Eth.Miner]
GasFloor = 8000000
GasCeil = 8000000
GasPrice = 1000000000
Recommit = 3000000000
Noverify = false
Recommit = 
```
